input_args.text: "While we (the U.S. gov't) have been spending money on MREs and MRAPs and bullets, the Russians have been improving their tech.  Instead of sending money to a fat piggie affirmative action baby runnind the DoJ to investigate BLM `issues, the Smirking Chimp in the White House would be better served spending money on the military to upgrade our now-two decade old military tech.  Oh wait, who am I kidding??"
